name: malnourishment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being weak and in bad health because of having too little food or too little of the types of food necessary for good health: The condition is caused by dehydration and malnourishment. Falls in extreme poverty have reduced the incidence of malnourishment or starvation. Synonym
malnutrition
More examplesFewer examplesShe was taken from her mother because of extreme neglect and malnourishment.I am not suffering from malnourishment or sleep deprivation.This is the real reason for the present malnourishment in the camps.
